pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 30, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, March 30, 2017:

Windsor, Ontario

9:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement at the Ford Essex Engine Plant with the Premier of Ontario, Kathleen Wynne. They will be joined by the Federal Minister of Innovation, Science and Economic Development, Navdeep Bains, and the Provincial Minister of Economic Development and Growth, Brad Duguid.

Ford Essex Engine Plant
1 Quality Way
Windsor, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 8:45 a.m. and should present themselves to the front lobby
  • Open coverage for photo opportunity and remarks

Brampton, Ontario

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will highlight Budget 2017 investments in AI research. A media availability will follow.

Magna International Inc.
2550 Steeles Avenue East
Brampton, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media must arrive no later than 1:30 p.m. via the main entrance. Parking available in the south east parking lot
  • Open coverage for visit, remarks and media availability

Media appearances

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on AM 800 CKLWâ€™s The Afternoon News at 3:20 p.m.

An interview with the Prime Minister will air on CTV Windsor at 6:00 p.m.


Note: all times local
